entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • netcore ilasm /debug on IL file with large number of methods unexpectedly reports 0x80070057 #62030
  • CI failure (net48 x86): GenerateResource.cache is being used by another process #62028
  • Observability candidate items for .NET 7.0 #62027
    .NET 7.0
  • Logger Generator not able to Resolve Generic Type Constraints #62026
  • Inconsistent HttpHeadersNonValidated behavior when response header added to a request #62024
  • [API Proposal]: Make BigInteger implement IConvertible #62022
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.StopwatchTests.GetTimestamp test fails in the CI #62021
  • Ordering issues with `DYN_BLK` nodes #62014
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to find a class without the namespace #62010
  • [API Proposal]: Make the Task.CancellationToken property public #62006
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbJumpKind == BBJ_NONE || block->bbJumpKind == BBJ_ALWAYS' #62005
    7.0.0
  • json config file has modified,but dotnet 6 can't reload on change when run in k8s configmap #62004
  • X509v3 Subject Alternative Name DirName #61998
    Future

Closed

  • Move libraries shims under src/native #61864
    7.0.0
  • MemoryStream.Read() throws ArgumentOutOfRangexception in .NET 6 but ArgumentException in .NET 5 #61994
  • ParameterInfo.RawDefaultValue throws when default value is string.empty #57238
    Future
  • API proposal: control Process.FileName search path #44792
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in Marshal.DestroyStructure with embedded structs containing delegates #61839
    7.0.0
  • How can a .NET Core Web Api running on Ubuntu Linux access a shared path in Windows? #61915
  • .NET seems to special-case renaming of EML files #61991
  • ANSICodePage returns zero for Traditional_Spanish_CI_AS collation #61977
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Win32.Registry has no dotnet 6.0.0 nuget package release #62009
  • Unable to deserialize ienumerables that is not a list #61993
  • Regex Bug - Failing Basic Operations #62017
  • [ilverify] Using ilverify with --include-file, --exclude-file or --ignore-error-file gives a System.NullReferenceException #62012
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to evaluate a static member in a nested class #61462
    7.0.0
  • [Android](CryptoNative_HmacUpdate): Parameter 'data' must be a valid pointer' #61783
  • .NET 6 native host executable seems broken in two ways #62007
  • System.Net test suites crashing in CI on OSX #43686
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: is there any methods can implement [:,:,::-1] operate in python #61957
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/Arm/Crc32.Arm64/Crc32.Arm64_ro/Crc32.Arm64_ro.sh #61897
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • needLabel assert #62025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress trim warning caused by recent attribute removal changes #62023
    area-System.ComponentModel, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62020
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix some missing debug info #62018
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use cross origin policy headers #62016
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] A draft of doc for describing debugger behavior. #62015
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP] Scavange fix #62008
    area-System.Net.Http
  • mono_runtime_delegate_invoke change to gc unsafe state #62003
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #62002
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add a github action to sync shared source from aspnetcore #61999
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Brand release/6.0-maui branch appropriately #61792
  • Reorganize libs.native #61958
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove support for Classic Xamarin for the Selector.GetHandle optimization, and add newer platforms. #61989
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use GeneratedDllImport for blittable p/invokes in System.Console, System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher, System.IO.Pipes #61996
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Handle empty string parameter value in MetadataLoadContext #61457
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Remove SupportedOSPlatformAttribute("windows") from LdapSessionOption #61388
    area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Splitting the hardware intrinsic tests into more test groupings #61973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.Diagnostics.EventLog #61990
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #61985
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #61992
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Fix Android crypto asserts #61827
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution
  • FIX - Using ilverify with --include-file, --exclude-file or --ignore-error-file gives a System.NullReferenceException #62013
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add some tests that validate debug info through ETW events #61962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute to runtime #61956
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use separate partials for iOS&tvOS instead of UnknowUnix in System.Diagnostics.Process #61871
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete dead code from `InferStructOpSizeAlign` #61880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean up test intermediates when clean test rebuild is requested #62001
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make more extensive use of lvaGetDesc() #61494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • prevent concurrent access to IO buffers on macOS #61723
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc CI/test run improvements #61937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Updated

  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] debug with modularized runtime(s) #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • fix for excessive gen0 in high memory load situation #61884
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Start building a universal System.Linq.Expressions library #61952
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve some cases of bad debug info propagation in optimized code #61846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Fix setting pipe used in PAL_ProbeMemory as nonblocking #61126
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update hash of the new CSE when resizing #61984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete `NumChildren`, `GetChild` and `gtGetChildPointer` #61875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Type memory maps with placeholders #61933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that we don't try to get the simdBaseJitType for scalar intrinsics #61982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Restrict the Selector.GetHandle intrinsic to GetHandle implementations that take an IntPtr. #61987
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.DirectoryServices #61975
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
